rows: Two {@creature Violet Fungus|XMM|Violet Fungi} and a {@creature Vine Blight|XMM} digesting dead sheep
A snarling {@creature Death Dog|XMM}, once someone's pet, now mutated by Gaunt's serum
A {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} pair of scabby {@creature Tough|XMM|Toughs} who ate infected food they stole from a local farmer
A young family trapped in their rickety home by their beloved uncle, who's been transformed by the fertilizer into a {@creature Myconid Spore Servant|XMM}
table.name: Finding Gaunt
